I'm gonna be going to the Grand Canyon tomorrow till Thursday or 
Friday, so I won't be able to post till then. Let's pause the battle 
at the Iron Fist till I get back (one or two days only, so no 
biggie). I'll try to find a way online there, but I doubt there'll be 
an internet comp, so I'll cya all thursday! I might be able to post 
tomorrow morning, but I don't know.

(Let's all hope I don't fall in!)
